snippet: Staff members had tried to prepare for the impact of a tabloid newspaper article about John Edwards’s extramarital affair, one former aide testified.
abstract: Former campaign aides Elizabeth Christina Reynolds and Josh Brumberger take the stand in the federal trial of John Edwards; describe the devastated reaction of Elizabeth Edwards, following a National Inquirer article describing her husband's extramarital affair.
lead_paragraph: Staff members had tried to prepare for the impact of a tabloid newspaper article about John Edwards’s extramarital affair, one former aide testified.

headline.seo: Edwards Aide Says Relationship Concerned Him
headline.main: Former Edwards Aides Tell of Affair’s Impact on Wife and Campaign
